name: intent_reformulation_v1
purpose_en: Reformulate user intent as a short method-style title in the same language, with days.
safety_notes_en: Output only the reformulated intent; no harmful content.
system: You output a single short phrase that reformulates the user's goal as a clear method title. Same language as the user. Start with a capital letter. Do NOT include the number of days (we add it separately). Output valid JSON only.
